description: Biopharma company classification taxonomy for investment analysis

development_stage.description: Company maturity based on pipeline and revenue stage

tiers.name: Large Cap Diversified
tiers.description: Multiple approved products, diversified pipeline, typically >$10B market cap

tiers.name: Commercial Stage
tiers.description: 1-3 approved products generating revenue, active pipeline

tiers.name: Late Clinical
tiers.description: Lead asset in Phase 3 or NDA/BLA filed, pre-revenue or minimal revenue

tiers.name: Mid Clinical
tiers.description: Lead asset in Phase 2, proof-of-concept data available or pending

tiers.name: Early Clinical
tiers.description: Lead asset in Phase 1 or IND-enabling, high-risk/high-reward

tiers.name: Small Molecule
tiers.description: Traditional oral/injectable small molecule drugs

tiers.name: Antibody/Biologics
tiers.description: Monoclonal antibodies, bispecifics, ADCs, fusion proteins

tiers.name: RNA Therapeutics
tiers.description: mRNA, siRNA, ASO-based therapeutics

tiers.name: Gene Therapy
tiers.description: AAV, lentiviral, and other gene delivery platforms

tiers.name: Cell Therapy
tiers.description: CAR-T, CAR-NK, TIL, and other cell-based therapies

tiers.name: Oligonucleotide
tiers.description: Antisense, splice-switching, and other oligo-based approaches

tiers.name: Oncology-Precision
tiers.description: Targeted oncology with biomarker-driven patient selection

tiers.name: Oncology-IO
tiers.description: Immuno-oncology approaches (checkpoint, cell therapy, etc.)

tiers.name: Rare-Genetic
tiers.description: Rare diseases with clear genetic etiology

tiers.name: Rare-Metabolic
tiers.description: Rare metabolic disorders and enzyme deficiencies

tiers.name: Neuropsychiatry
tiers.description: CNS disorders including neuro and psychiatric conditions

tiers.name: I&I/Autoimmune
tiers.description: Immunology and autoimmune/inflammatory diseases

tiers.name: Cardiometabolic
tiers.description: Cardiovascular and metabolic diseases

tiers.name: Ophthalmology
tiers.description: Eye diseases and vision disorders

tiers.name: Infectious Disease
tiers.description: Vaccines, antivirals, antibiotics

thesis_type.description: Investment thesis archetype for position sizing and risk management

tiers.name: Platform/Royalty
tiers.description: Value driven by platform partnerships, royalties, or multiple pipeline shots on goal

tiers.name: Binary Event
tiers.description: Near-term catalyst (data readout, approval) that will significantly move stock

tiers.name: Commercial Compounder
tiers.description: Growing commercial franchise with predictable revenue trajectory

tiers.name: Sum-of-Parts
tiers.description: Multiple undervalued assets where total value > current market cap

tiers.name: M&A Target
tiers.description: Strategic asset likely to be acquired, floor valuation from takeout

priority_levels.description: Research priority for position sizing and coverage depth

tiers.name: High
tiers.description: Core position, deep coverage required

tiers.name: Medium
tiers.description: Watchlist/smaller position, moderate coverage

tiers.name: Low
tiers.description: Monitoring only, light coverage
